title: Prospects of ruthenate-based electrodes in metal-ion batteries
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00783B, Review Article
Abdul Majid, Bazgha Khadim, Mohammad Alkhedher, Niyazi Bulut
Advancements in energy storage technology have led to the exploration of novel functional materials that have been at the heart of materials science, especially in this century.
